ValidationRule.description: Check to see if the Bill To Account has the correct fields for Bill To information
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Closed Won'), NOT( $Permission.BYPASS_ALL_VALIDATIONS_ON_OPPTY ), OR( ISBLANK( Bill_To_Account__r.Bill_To_Contact__c ), ISBLANK( Bill_To_Account__r.Bill_To_Email__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Missing Bill To Contact Information. Please complete the 'Bill To Contact' and 'Bill To Email' in the Bill To Account.
